algorithm_technique: BFS/DFS for region identification and wall placement strategy
problem_summary_simple: Quarantine virus spread by building walls around the most threatening infected regions each day.
problem_summary_technical: Identify infected regions, calculate their threat (uninfected neighbors), build walls around the highest threat region, then spread virus.
key_insights: identify connected components of infected cells
for each region, calculate perimeter and potential spread
prioritize quarantining regions with largest potential spread
